purpose: To provide a flexible framework for building and managing agentic schemas that enhance the capabilities of AI agents.
principle: Adopt a modular architecture that promotes interoperability and extensibility, allowing developers to create custom agents tailored to specific tasks.
reusability: Designed to enable the reuse of components across different projects, facilitating quicker development cycles and reducing redundancy.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may result in incomplete features and potential instability. Limited documentation and community support may also pose challenges for new users.
name: oasf
